'''1.21.132''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on January 8, 2026 on most devices and on January 9, 2026 on PlayStation 5, which addresses issues discovered in the latest update.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/42519424555021-Minecraft-1-21-132-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.132 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=January 8, 2026}}</ref> This is the first version released in 2026.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.132
|232933|Clocks and compasses are invisible after the new update
|233088|Xbox: Additional players in splitscreen log in with no items/the wrong user's items after 1.21.130 update
|233369|Add-on assets disappearing in split screen
|233598|Player is kicked out of world with "Block" error code if a command affects too many entities
|otherissuescount=3}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue where textures would not be correctly reloaded when changing between graphics modes in the main menu.
* Fixed a freeze that could happen when buying a Realm on Nintendo Switch.
* Fixed attachables not rendering correctly when the game is paused or when rendered in an NPC UI window.
